title: Combining Sumtcita
goal: Use multiple sumtcita in one sentence.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Review all 8 vocabulary words:

road → ?        field → ?
mountain → ?    river → ?
sea → ?         cave → ?
place → ?       station → ?

(Answers: dargu, foldi, cmana, rirxe, xamsi, kevna, stuzi, tcana)

New Material (5-7 min)

Multiple Sumtcita

You can use several sumtcita in one sentence:

mi klama fa'a lo cmana mu'i lo nu mi djica

I go toward the mountain motivated by desire.

mi ciska lo jufra pi'o lo penbi bu'u lo zdani

I write sentences using a pen at home.

Order Matters

Sumtcita usually appear before the selbri:

mi mu'i lo prami bu'u lo zdani cu gunka

I, motivated by love, at home, work.

Or after with cu:

mi cu gunka bu'u lo zdani pi'o lo skami

I work at home using a computer.

Complex Example

mi klama fa'a lo cmana to'o lo zdani mu'i lo nu viska lo xamsi

I go toward the mountain, away from home, motivated by wanting to see the sea.

Using cu

cu separates sumtcita from selbri:

mi pi'o lo penbi cu ciska

I, using a pen, write.

Key Point

Multiple sumtcita can stack. Use cu to clearly separate them from the selbri.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Two Sumtcita

Translate:

  1. I work at home using a computer.
  2. I go toward the mountain because I want to.
  3. I write in Lojban using a pen.
Answers
  1. mi gunka bu'u lo zdani pi'o lo skami
  2. mi klama fa'a lo cmana mu'i lo nu mi djica
  3. mi ciska bau la .jbobau. pi'o lo penbi

Exercise 2: Three Sumtcita

Translate:

  1. I walk at the field toward the river because I'm happy.
  2. I work at home in English using a computer.
Answers
  1. mi cadzu bu'u lo foldi fa'a lo rirxe mu'i lo nu mi gleki
  2. mi gunka bu'u lo zdani bau la .glibau. pi'o lo skami

Exercise 3: Comprehension

What does this mean?

mi klama to'o lo kevna fa'a lo tcana mu'i lo nu mi bilma
Answer

I go away from the cave toward the station motivated by being sick.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I work at home using a computer." → mi gunka bu'u lo zdani pi'o lo skami
  2. "I go toward the mountain." → mi klama fa'a lo cmana
  3. "I speak in Lojban at the station." → mi tavla bau la .jbobau. bu'u lo tcana

Today's Review

Combining sumtcita:

Pattern Example
Location + Cause bu'u X mu'i Y
Instrument + Location pi'o X bu'u Y
Direction + Language fa'a X bau Y

Summary

You practiced combining multiple sumtcita in one sentence. Order and cu help maintain clarity.
